title: PDF's Multiple Files to Single Files
content:
Anyone out there know how to convert one large PDF with say 50 pages into individual filed PDF’s?

Cheers

James

 [‹ Problem: Adobe Garamond Premier Pro in InDesign CS2 giving strange "st" and "sp" combinations](http://web.archive.org/web/20080403205739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30509 "Go to previous forum topic") [Indesign - facing pages? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080403205739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30603 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Scriven

comments.content:
Scratch that, I just used Automator for the first time. .. ever

Anyone else ever find any use for automator?
Yes, it’s mighty good for saving a lot of files for web, since Photoshop Batch won’t let you do that.
You can also use the “Extract Pages” command under the Document menu in Acrobat. There’s an option to extract the pages as separate files.
